EmailTemplate.description: Close Application after 395 days of submission if it's not approved/denied
EmailTemplate.name: JFS Application Closed
EmailTemplate.subject: Application for Licensure Submitted for {!CLQ_Program_Transaction__c.CLQ_Program_Name__c}, {!CLQ_Program_Transaction__c.CLQ_Program_Number__c} Closed
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
JFS has reviewed the submitted application for licensure for {!CLQ_Program_Transaction__c.CLQ_Program_Name__c}, {!CLQ_Program_Transaction__c.CLQ_Program_Number__c}.
Your application has been closed for the following reason(s):
Application has been on file more than 12 months and all requirements were not completed.
Contact the Child Care Help Desk for additional assistance at 1-877-302-2347.
The Ohio Child Licensing and Quality System Team
This e-mail message, including any attachments, is for the sole use of the intended recipient(s) and may contain private, confidential, and/or privileged information. Any unauthorized review, use, disclosure, or distribution is prohibited.
ref: {!CLQ_Program_Transaction__c.Id}
